author: Novelty
title: Sensei
review: This little boat seems ordinary at first glance, but a second glance reveals a feature that is unique to this set.  First of all, there's the lamp on the front of the boat.  Nothing new there, but this is probably the first time that the lamp has been affixed to a boat.  This is also the first set with a plate attached to a minifig to represent his hat.  It's comical, but with the wizards beard, it works.  The alternate model shows a winged person that's just comical though...

author: Gus_263
title: Ninja Boat
review: Another small set of the ninja theme, this don't includes a ninja, but another cool minifigure that looks like a sensei with a beard, also included on the wizards of the castle theme, and a piece used as his hat. The boat is good builted for a small set, without the pieces previously included in the pirates theme. A crystal is included, with a barrel. For a small set, this is useful, the playability isn't very great due to the size, but still good also in building, i rate this 5/5.
